name: SCNHitTestSearchMode
desc: Possible values for the searchMode option used with hit-testing methods.

items.name: case all
items.desc: The hit test should return all possible results, sorted from nearest to farthest.

items.name: case any
items.desc: The hit test should return only the first object found, regardless of distance.

items.name: case closest
items.desc: The hit test should return only the closes object found.
